items.title: What is rwrtr?
items.text:
rwrtr is a tool for parsing, translating and rewriting articles. You can use it to translate articles from one language to another or rewrite them for SEO or reading optimization. 
 Simply paste the link to the article, choose the source and target language. Our service will automatically parse, translate, and provide you with the opportunity to edit the content.

items.title: It is free?
items.text: Yes, it is free to use.

items.title: Why is my page not being translated?
items.text: The reason is that the content is not in the language you want to translate to. You can change the source language in the settings.

items.title: Are queries saved?
items.text: No, queries are not saved in the database, but are temporarily cached in memory
